full_title: Neva Play by Megan Thee Stallion (Ft. RM)
title: Neva Play

description.plain:
“Neva Play”, featuring RM, is the first single rumored to be on the deluxe of the MEGAN record. “Neva Play” serves as a versatile reminder of Megan’s and RMs’ priorities and what they never (“neva”) play about.

Megan and RM previously worked together on the BTS song “Butter (Megan Thee Stallion Remix)” in August 2021, which peaked at number three on the Global 200. Megan was also brought out on BTS’ tour to perform the song.

This is another one of Meg’s official releases under her independent record label and entertainment company, Hot Girl Productions. The track was produced by LilJuMadeDaBeat, Shawn “Source” Jarrett, Dominique Cook & Shae Jacobs. The official cover art is drawn by the creator of the popular black animated sitcom, The Boondocks.

The song was first teased by Thee Stallion, on August 29th of 2024, with a simple “🐎X💜 👀” which had multiple people suspect it was BTS by the purple heart. The next day, the official BTS account confirmed the speculation with a tweet, “🐎X🦔(🐨) Coming Soon! 💜👀”.
